mapper.select: Select TO_CHAR(m_regdate, 'yyyy-mm')as month , count(*) as reservation From member_tbl where m_status = 'active' group by TO_CHAR(m_regdate, 'yyyy-mm') order by TO_CHAR(m_regdate, 'yyyy-mm') desc

Select TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm')as month , count(*) as reservation From Reservation_tbl where r_approval = 'Y' group by TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm') order by TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm') desc

Select TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm')as month , sum(r_payPrice)as r_payprice From Reservation_tbl where r_approval = 'Y' group by TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm') order by TO_CHAR(r_startDate, 'yyyy-mm') desc
